title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify and document the functional and non-functional requirements of the DistributedTimeTravelDatabase.

title: Design the Database Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the distributed time-travel database, considering data distribution, scalability, and consistency.

title: Design the Time-Travel Query System
description: Design a system that allows for time-travel queries across the large-scale dataset.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the necessary backend services for the distributed time-travel database.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to interact with the distributed time-travel database.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Write and execute unit tests for individual components and integration tests to ensure proper functioning of the overall system.

title: Deploy the DistributedTimeTravelDatabase
description: Deploy the distributed time-travel database to a production environment, ensuring proper configuration and monitoring.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to identify and address any potential vulnerabilities in the distributed time-travel database.
